text: Hey, I am using 'Make' to create an Timeline API Event when submitting a form. The integration works, when someone fills in the form it creates timeline event on the contacts but the additional data from the form is not pulling in. Could any help me with this please. Thank You
this might be a stupid question, but why not use a private app in that case?

• Built using custom form (html/js - and sending form data using contacts api)
• Form doesn't have captcha
• Just passing directly to HubSpot using HubSpot Contact API
• No plugins as the form is made from scratch
Hi everybody I am working on a template , we are making some changes but  I am having a problem with FontAwesome the icons are not being rendered only squares are showing up
The icon from font awesome is Arrow
And some invalid square is showing up
I fixed it copy CDN of fontawesome paste it in your main css
Could be the missing or wrong font-width
Does anyone know the reason why it is not possible to create a page via API in Content Staging?
indeed, the missing font-width could be the fix
